Posts.Title: Books Newbies Should Avoid? Sido cookiegal

Posts.Content: Oct 14, 2009 05:21PM charlavan wrote: I wrote Tittatts: Lfe After Breast Cancer which I think you might enjoy more.  It deals with my own cancer and modified radical mastectomy but it also deals with getting on with your life.  I write a weekly newspaper column called Pearls so the back half of my books is dedicated to those usually funny, sometimes relevant every day issues. The cancer was devastating but then, stuff happens.  I am fine and it was 10 years ago.  I lived it and am still dealing with the effects but am actually happier today than before the 'event'. The current book I am about to finish is called THE LUMP.  It deals with the different treatment methods and the effects of them.  It also suggests a few things that will be more helpful than the gloom and doom we feel in the begining. You can see more about the books and me at www.tittatts.com or www.charlavan.com
